Job Title: Manager, Sourcing and Procurement

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Purchasing, Supply Chain

Description:
Join our mission in simplifying the way that IT assets are procured and managed across the globe, whether your employees are in-office, hybrid, or fully remote. We are a hard-working and committed team, focused on scaling our operations, expanding to new regions, and continually improving our processes, all while putting our customers first. 
Our team is expanding and we are excited to bring on a Manager of Sourcing and Procurement. We’re looking for someone who has experience with hardware reselling, is well-versed in ABM and Autopilot enrollment, is passionate about managing a team, and thrives in a fast-paced, constantly changing environment. 
Key Responsibilities:
Implement quality program to hold vendors accountable to the highest level of service delivery excellenceEvaluate and formalize new vendor relationships to ensure business continuity in existing regions, while also enabling expansion into new regionsAct as the subject matter expert for Autopilot / ABM enrollment & MDM related inquiries (knowledge of ZTE also a plus)Act as the escalation point for all procurement related issuesPartner with Product & Engineering to improve the allwhere platform over time, while also implementing stopgap solutions to solve for immediate-term needsEvaluate end-to-end procurement workflows and implement process improvements to reduce inefficiencies Align procurement operations to industry best practices while also thinking outside the box to implement creative solutions where neededBuild procurement related enablement materials for cross-functional teams as neededDevelop, monitor, and maintain key performance indicators that best demonstrate the performance of the procurement functionImplement creative solutions to reduce procurement related escalations across all regionsBuild processes to maximize margin while prioritizing service delivery excellence Work effectively with stakeholders across multiple levels of the organization in order to achieve business objectives
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degreeExperience with ABM & Autopilot enrollmentStrong vendor management skillsStrong people management skillsDirect experience working with ERP systems (Acumatica a plus)Prior experience managing or facilitating the resale of IT assetsStrong attention to detail and ability to multitaskExcellent written and verbal communication skillsData-driven mindsetAbility to collaborate effectively with a diverse team in a fast-paced environment

Experience Level (if available): None
